build_environment.account: <account id for the account building the CDK app>
build_environment.region: <region id for the account building the CDK app>

frontend.owner: <name of the frontend app repo owner>

env.account: <account id for the account building the dev enviroment>
env.region: <region id for the account building the dev enviroment>

env.account: <account id for the account building the prod enviroment>
env.region: <region id for the account building the prod enviroment>
